description:
Junta has to go location shooting and won`t be able to see Takato for four whole days. Meanwhile, Takato starts rehearsing for his upcoming play, and the lead person for this play is…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Can Make You My Woman.
Ore no Onna ni Shite Agemasu yo.
俺の女にしてあげますよ.
